Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Dmitry Kulikov?

Dmitry Kulikov is 34 years old.

When was Dmitry Kulikov born?

Dmitry Kulikov was born on October 29, 1990.

Where was Dmitry Kulikov born?

Dmitry Kulikov was born in Lipetsk, USSR.

How tall is Dmitry Kulikov?

Dmitry Kulikov is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much does Dmitry Kulikov weigh?

Dmitry Kulikov weighs 212 lbs (96 kg).

How many goals does Dmitry Kulikov have?

Dmitry Kulikov had 4 goals last season and 50 goals over his career.

How many points does Dmitry Kulikov have?

Dmitry Kulikov had 13 points last season and 247 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Dmitry Kulikov won?

Dmitry Kulikov has won 2 Stanley Cups as a player.
